title: Keima thlarau tidam turin
lyrics:
Keima thlarau tidam turin,
Thing anchhe dawngah a tuar a;
Isuan min va khawngaih em ve!
Sawi aiin min khawngaih.

An sawi aiin min khawngaih zawk,
An sawi aiin min khawngaih zawk;
Isuan min va khawngaih em ve!
Sawi aiin min khawngaih.

A lungngaihna a ngaithei a,
Hrehawm tuarin a inngaitlawm;
Chatuana ka nunna turin,
Sawi aiin min khawngaih.

Thlamuan nan Isua nei turin,
Pathian hnenah ka ngen chiam a;
Thisen hluin min tlan zo va,
Sawi aiin min khawngaih.

Min ven vangin ka lawm em emm,
Chawlhna min pe, ka hahdam thin;
Isua thutiam a ral lo vang,
Sawi aiin min khawngaih.
